timeline.bodyText: The web.config under wwwroot is no longer required for ASP.NET Core 2.1 / 2.2.
timeline.author: shibayan

replies.bodyText:
We can remove it in the upcoming major release 5.0.x.
The upcoming release 4.3.1 (this week) is a patch release (without breaking changes)
replies.author: wing328

replies.bodyText: @shibayan PM me on Slack if you've further question on this.
replies.author: wing328
